overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a diverse social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers. His content primarily focuses on research in social media analysis and disinformation, garnering notable engagement across platforms.

contentThemes.description: Posts about new papers, grants, and research projects in the field of social media analysis.
Discussions and content revolving around research methods for studying disinformation and social media phenomena.
Announcements regarding job openings and opportunities for collaboration in research projects.

recommendations: Increase the frequency of posts related to research findings and projects to maintain audience interest.
Engage with followers by responding to comments and reposts to build a more interactive community.

platformInsights.mastodon: Mastodon posts show consistent engagement with a focus on methodological discussions, yet there is room to increase likes and reposts.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn posts have high engagement, particularly with posts about research grants and hiring, suggesting a professional audience keen on academic and career-related content.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
Just published our new paper on coordinated inauthentic behavior on social media platforms!
Our team has just released v2.0 of CooRnet, with improved algorithms for detecting coordinated link sharing behavior.
